Package slitherio.view

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
slitherio.view.Controller
public final class Controller extends Object
Fait le lien entre la vue et le model. Cette classe contient la boucle principale du jeu (animate()). Elle se charge de lier les éléments du model et leur vue (bind()).

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      protected Controller(javafx.scene.layout.Pane root, double width, double height, String nameGame)
      Create a new instance of Controller. This constructor also create player(s) and inisialize the game and it view.
      Parameters:
      root - the pane of view
      width - the window's width
      height - the window's height
      nameGame - the game's name

  • Method Details

    • startGame

      protected final void startGame()
      Main function that initialize all values of game and launch it

    • animate

      protected final void animate()
      Main loop, using the "ups constant" method. The game is update every 0.01 seconds.

    • onKeyPressed

      protected final void onKeyPressed(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode key)
      Manage pressed key
      Parameters:
      key - the key that has been pressed

    • onMouseMoved

      protected final void onMouseMoved(double mouseX, double mouseY)
      Manage action when the mouse is moved.
      Parameters:
      mouseX - X-coordinate of the mouse
      mouseY - Y-coordinate of the mouse
